text: I have almost zero knowledge of the Visual Novel genre, but I found out about this game after hunting for more awesome Ryu Umemoto music, an FM-synth master. It turns out YU-NO on PC-98 is a pioneer in the genre and influenced most VNs (including Steins;Gate anf Fate/stay night) and even anime/manga in general, being responsible for a lot of tropes we now commonly see. Even if this is not my kind of genre, reading this game's Legacy section on its Wikipedia page was very interesting. They actually released a remake on Switch/PS4/Steam last year.
author: SupraDarky
